title: Blended and Collaborative Learning Strategies for Strengthening Foundational Business Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic business-related terminology and foundational mathematical competency
context.additional_context: Operating a real-time feedback and group activity monitoring system using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core business administration concepts (e.g., organizational management, marketing strategy) by applying them to real-world cases.
Learners establish and execute self-directed learning plans using digital tools (tablets, LMS) in a blended learning environment.
Learners complete projects by utilizing role distribution and communication strategies among team members through collaborative learning activities.
Learners propose at least three creative ideas to solve problems presented in group discussions.

resources: Smart Pads and Basic Analysis Software
Circular table arrangement for collaborative learning
Emotion analysis AI program (for measuring group participation)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
